description: This requirement is open only to those Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement under Tier 1 Stream Holders who qualified under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services. The RFP is issued against the TBIPS Supply Arrangements (SA) PWGSC file number EN578-170432. All terms and conditions of the SA apply and must be incorporated into any resulting contract.

full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) Info

#### Tender Information

- **Reference number:** cb-806-69007492
- **Amendment number:** 1
- **Solicitation number:** R000164935
- **Publication date:** 2024-05-21
- **Tender closing date:** 2024-06-07 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
- **Applicable trades:** Information technology consultation services

#### Priced/Unpriced Bids
 Competitive - Selective tendering method.

#### Price
- **Selection criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Note:**
The tender is for the provision of business architecture services to Shared Services Canada under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

#### Tender Context
- The tender is open only to Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement under Tier 1 Stream Holders who are qualified under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services.
- The RFP is issued under the TBIPS Supply Arrangements (SA) PWGSC file number EN578-170432.
- The following companies have been pre-qualified to submit a proposal:
    •	Akendi Inc.
    •	Alithya Canada Inc.
    •	Bits In Glass Inc.
    •	Cogniva Information Solutions Inc.
    •	Dolomite Networks Corporation
    •	Maplestream Inc., Cofomo Inc. IN JOINT VENTURE
    •	MDOS Consulting Inc.
    •	MONZ Consulting Inc., Newfound Recruiting  Corporation, in Joint Venture
    •	Prompta Inc.
    •	SEASI Consulting Inc.
    •	Solutions Moerae Inc.
    •	Systematix IT Solutions Inc./Systematix Technologies de L’Information Inc./Les Services Conseils Systematix Inc. In Joint Venture
    •	TECSIS Corporation
    •	Thinkpoint Inc.
    •	TPG Technology Consulting Ltd.

#### Trade Agreements
- The tender is subject to several trade agreements, including:
    •	*Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    •	*Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    •	*Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    •	*World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    •	*Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA
